name: The Sun, Space Weather, and India’s Solar Quest
description: Have you ever wondered how the Sun influences life on Earth beyond just providing light and warmth? The Sun's magnetic activities, such as solar flares and coronal mass ejections, can cause space weather events that disrupt satellites, power grids, and communication systems. Understanding the science behind space weather and its effects on modern technology is key to grasping Earth’s relationship with the Sun. India has made significant contributions to solar research—from over a century of observations at the Kodaikanal Solar Observatory to the Aditya-L1 mission and the proposed National Large Solar Telescope—highlighting the need for continued solar exploration. Join Jayant Joshi to explore the Sun, space weather, and India’s efforts to understand our nearest star.

name: Into the Cosmos: The Ultimate Astronomy Quiz
description: Are you an astronomy enthusiast or a passionate stargazer? Join the facilitators of Indian Institute of Astrophysics for an exciting quiz that will challenge your understanding of the cosmos! This quiz will feature questions on the latest astronomical discoveries, iconic telescopes, renowned astronomers, and famous celestial objects. Form a team of three people and dive into the wonders of the universe. Whether you're a seasoned space buff or a curious learner, this quiz is designed for all ages to explore the mysteries of our cosmos!
